org.newdawn.slick.tiled
Class TiledMapPlus

java.lang.Object
  org.newdawn.slick.tiled.TiledMap
      org.newdawn.slick.tiled.TiledMapPlus

public class TiledMapPlus
extends TiledMap

An extended version of the TiledMap class, with more functionality. A merge of Liam (liamzebedee) Edwards-Playne's existing library, TiledMapPlus

Author:
liamzebedee
